attributes.action: To include No Deal in any People’s or 2nd Referendum vote
attributes.additional_details: I for one think it’s time that it goes back to the people with just 2 options ‘LEAVE WITH A DEAL or LEAVE WITHOUT A DEAL’ with NO choice to REMAIN as we have already voted on that one.
attributes.background: I don’t know about all you out there whether you voted Leave or Remain but I am getting seriously fed up with self righteous MP’s telling me a No Deal will be bad and in the same breath promoting we accept a deal that has already been voted down by themselves as a ‘Bad Deal’
